NOTES:
This is a rip of the GET SMART MURIO custom dvdr....which is the best to date...
The picture for a cam is really sharp...sound isn&#039;t too bad either.
Only really problem with this is there&#039;s a bit of camera movement so sometimes you get black borders at the top
other times you see the back of two chairs....


WORK DONE:
Well firstly i left the audio on this one......not to bad for a cam in the first place.
Has for the picture it needed to be made brigther and more colourful....
Did this bt increasing the chroma contrast,gamm,lum......also then lowered down the rgb black base to tone down any bright spots.
Also had to do some cropping all over the place.....needed to cut the film into several files due to different cropping needed to be done.
You still see back of some chairs now and again but couldn&#039;t crop anymore otherwise you would lose the subs ......(only when needed)
